knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
library(RSelenium)
library(netstat)
library(tidyverse)
free_port()
ports_in_use()
## Now we want to initiate the Selenium server
rd<- rsDriver(browser = "chrome",
              chromever = "101.0.4951.41", 
              verbose = FALSE,
              port = 1716L)
ffd<-rd$client
# Navigate to page
ffd$navigate("https://www.olx.in/dehradun_g4059236/cars_c84/")
# load button
load_btn<- ff$findElement(using = "css selector", ".rui-1JPTg span")
loadbtn$clickElement()
```
